document.full_text: the u.s. coast guard said it had reopened a nine-mile (14-km) stretch of the mississippi river near baton rouge, louisiana, to southbound traffic on tuesday afternoon.
document.title: mississippi at baton rouge opens southbound: coast guard
lines_and_colors: the u.s. coast guard said it had reopened a nine-mile (14-km) stretch of the mississippi river near baton rouge, louisiana, to southbound traffic on tuesday afternoon.
